ygData.subject: Disallowed characters in Gladiator.
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, Does anyone know if specific characters are not allowed in Gladiator? I m writing the last part of the scenario converter and the very last bit of code

Hi,
Does anyone know if specific characters are not allowed in Gladiator?

I'm writing the last part of the scenario converter and the very last bit of
code before I start testing it is dealing with reading the object lines and
processing them.
Most of it is ok, except for name and the reserved data.

For reserved it's also ok if the '/r' and '/n' characters can't be used in
gladiator (they represent cariage return and linefeed, and I don't think
glad needs them).

For name its a bit different, as in the text files I've separated things
with a comma but I believe it is quite possible to use a comma within
gladiator, so that'd cause problems.  I could also use a comma and then
check that the next few characters are a space and then "Reserved:" (this is
in front of the reserved data in the file), however someone will eventually
build a scenario with that in a characters name just for fun :)

So what I need is to replace my separator character with something that
isn't allowed in Gladiator, or at least not allowed in the names of
characters.
Once I solve the problem I can then make sure the code works and the
converter is done!

Any suggestions?  Do the other coders have a different method I could use?

Cya's,
Deathifier
